name: Heiress II
description:
"kindness"

In Heiress II the protagonist Mikhail finds himself at a gala charity evening on a luxury airship, as part of a "date auction". Surprisingly, the highest bidder for him is the richest woman on board, Cen Isyanina.

This title is an original ATP Projects release, published 2009-03-31. It was written, produced and directed by mikey. The character art was created by Ren and backgrounds were drawn by Cloud^. The title uses the Ren'Py engine modified by PyTom. Estimated completion time is 40 minutes.

Heiress II is game Nr. 17 of the Original 22.
